articles.title: Anton Olsson-Collentine
articles.contents:
Anton Olsson-Collentine
          
          
          Home
          Publications
          CV
          Writing
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Anton Olsson-Collentine
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I am a PhD candidate with the Meta-research Center at Tilburg University. My research interests include meta- and multiverse analyses, the interpretation of statistical output and facilitating statistical best practices.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Anton Olsson-Collentine
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                    
                  
                                  
              
            
            
              I am a PhD candidate with the Meta-research Center at Tilburg University. My research interests include meta- and multiverse analyses, the interpretation of statistical output and facilitating statistical best practices.

pdf website
Anton Olsson-Collentine, Jelte M. Wicherts, Marcel A. L. M. van Assen (2020). Heterogeneity in direct replications in psychology and its association with effect size. Psychological Bulletin, https://doi.org/10.1037/bul0000294. pdf code/data 
Esther Maassen, Marcel A. L. M. van Assen, Michele B. Nuijten, Anton Olsson-Collentine, Jelte M. Wicherts (2020). Reproducibility of Individual Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses in Psychology. PLOS ONE, https://10.1371/journal.pone.0233107. pdf code/data 
Anton Olsson-Collentine, Marcel A. L. M. van Assen, Chris H. J. Hartgerink (2019). The Prevalence of Marginally Significant Results in Psychology Over Time. Psychological Science, https://doi.org/10.1177/0956797619830326. pdf code/data 
J. Mulder, A. Olsson-Collentine (2019). Simple Bayesian Testing of Scientific Expectations in Linear Regression Models. Behavior Research Methods, https://doi.org/10.3758/s13428-018-01196-9 pdf code supplement
